title: Hesed Kindness Spine offers chiropractic care, therapeutic massage, naturopathic care, acupuncture and rehab exercises
description: At Hesed Kindness Spine, we are proud to serve the community in Eastside and the greater Seattle area, providing chiropractic care for our patients.
cleaned_text: you have a chronic physical condition or are suffering from an unexpected illness or injury, we can provide services that will help restore your physical condition to its natural, healthy state. You can be assured - we have a commitment to excellence when it comes to the level of care we provide/strong> Chiropractic care focuses on disorders of the musculoskeletal system and the nervous system, and the effects of these disorders on general health. Chiropractic care is used most often to treat neuromusculoskeletal complaints, including but not limited to back pain, neck pain, pain in the joints of the arms or legs, and headaches. Chiropractic physicians practice a drug-free, hands-on approach to health care that includes patient examination, diagnosis and treatment. Chiropractors have broad diagnostic skills and are also trained to recommend therapeutic and rehabilitative exercises, as well as to provide nutritional, dietary and lifestyle counseling. Naturopathic medicine emphasizes prevention, treatment, and optimal health through the use of therapeutic methods and substances that encourage individuals' inherent self-healing process. Naturopathic practice includes the following therapies: dietary and lifestyle changes, stress reduction, nutritional medicine, herbs and other dietary supplements, homeopathy, prescription medication and practitioner-guided detoxification. Acupuncture is the stimulation of specific acupoints in the body by inserting very thin needles into the skin. Sometimes heat, pressure, or mild electrical current are used along with the needles. Acupuncture is a traditional component of traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) and uses the stimulation of acupoints to correct the flow of qi energy that flows through the body through meridians. Acupuncture treats a wide range of conditions and is commonly used for pain relief. To help patients achieve the therapeutic goals prescribed by our chiropractic and medical professionals, our staff provides therapeutic massages utilizing a wide range of massage styles depending on the patient's therapeutic goals. Our medical professionals and staff prescribe and provide instruction on a rehabilitation exercises for a wide-range of conditions to help our patients achieve their therapeutic goals. Laser therapy was approved by FDA since 2003 and it is a medical treatment that uses focused light to enter our body to increase a cellular metabolism, which decrease pain and inflammation accelerate the healing process.
